title: my favorite album
content:
prismatic CD-ROM rainbow,
my favorite album
skipping on rainclouds.

warping in the window
closer than it appears,
oil spill looms large.

too heavy to move so fast:
pendulum undulate, glacier mass.
my favorite album.

driving to meet you once again,
that polychromatic monument,
these american prairie lightning nights.

my favorite album.
